findings.message:
JCT.totalSupply (0x0c1d55e948d26c1e7a6bc9a1f93c9d15395a39f1.sol#185) shadows:
	- ERC20.totalSupply (0x0c1d55e948d26c1e7a6bc9a1f93c9d15395a39f1.sol#159)
findings.name: shadowing-abstract

findings.message:
JCT.constructor(address).founder (0x0c1d55e948d26c1e7a6bc9a1f93c9d15395a39f1.sol#198) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = founder (0x0c1d55e948d26c1e7a6bc9a1f93c9d15395a39f1.sol#199)
		- collector = founder (0x0c1d55e948d26c1e7a6bc9a1f93c9d15395a39f1.sol#200)
		- distributor = founder (0x0c1d55e948d26c1e7a6bc9a1f93c9d15395a39f1.sol#201)
		- freezer = founder (0x0c1d55e948d26c1e7a6bc9a1f93c9d15395a39f1.sol#202)
findings.name: missing-zero-check

findings.message:
JCT.distributeTokens(address[],uint256[]) (0x0c1d55e948d26c1e7a6bc9a1f93c9d15395a39f1.sol#336-357) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(hasSameArrayLength(addresses,amounts) && isAvailableAccount(msg.sender)) (0x0c1d55e948d26c1e7a6bc9a1f93c9d15395a39f1.sol#337-338)
	- require(bool)(amounts[j] > 0 && isNonZeroAccount(addresses[j]) && isAvailableAccount(addresses[j])) (0x0c1d55e948d26c1e7a6bc9a1f93c9d15395a39f1.sol#343-345)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
JCT.isAvailableAccount(address) (0x0c1d55e948d26c1e7a6bc9a1f93c9d15395a39f1.sol#360-362) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- isUnLockedAccount(_addr) && isUnfrozenAccount(_addr) (0x0c1d55e948d26c1e7a6bc9a1f93c9d15395a39f1.sol#361)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
JCT.transfer(address,uint256) (0x0c1d55e948d26c1e7a6bc9a1f93c9d15395a39f1.sol#260-269) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(hasEnoughBalance(msg.sender,_value) && isAvailableAccount(msg.sender) && isAvailableAccount(_to)) (0x0c1d55e948d26c1e7a6bc9a1f93c9d15395a39f1.sol#261-263)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
JCT.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (0x0c1d55e948d26c1e7a6bc9a1f93c9d15395a39f1.sol#277-289) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(isNonZeroAccount(_to) && hasEnoughBalance(_from,_value) && allowance[_from][msg.sender] >= _value && isAvailableAccount(_from) && isAvailableAccount(_to)) (0x0c1d55e948d26c1e7a6bc9a1f93c9d15395a39f1.sol#278-282)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
JCT.isUnLockedAccount(address) (0x0c1d55e948d26c1e7a6bc9a1f93c9d15395a39f1.sol#365-367) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- now > unlockUnixTime[_addr] (0x0c1d55e948d26c1e7a6bc9a1f93c9d15395a39f1.sol#366)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
JCT.collectTokens(address[],uint256[]) (0x0c1d55e948d26c1e7a6bc9a1f93c9d15395a39f1.sol#314-331) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(amounts[j] > 0 && isNonZeroAccount(addresses[j]) && isAvailableAccount(addresses[j])) (0x0c1d55e948d26c1e7a6bc9a1f93c9d15395a39f1.sol#320-322)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
JCT.isUnfrozenAccount(address) (0x0c1d55e948d26c1e7a6bc9a1f93c9d15395a39f1.sol#370-372) compares to a boolean constant:
	-frozenAccount[_addr] == false (0x0c1d55e948d26c1e7a6bc9a1f93c9d15395a39f1.sol#371)
findings.name: boolean-equal

findings.message:
Version constraint ^0.4.24 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ABIEncoderV2PackedStorage_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- EventStructWrongData.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.24 (0x0c1d55e948d26c1e7a6bc9a1f93c9d15395a39f1.sol#1)
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: solc-0.4.26 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
findings.name: solc-version
